MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW1 postcode area of Crewe affecting properties in Lime Tree Avenue , Sorbus Drive and the surrounding area. Our team are on site carrying out further investigations into the cause of your power loss and we now expect to have supplies restored by 8pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:17pm on the 11th November 2020.
